title: No increase in power tariff: Hammad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 11 (APP):Minister for Energy Hammad Azhar on Friday said no increase was made in power tariff.
Every month, new fuel cost adjustment (FCA) was added to the electricity by excluding last month FCA due to increase in coal, LNG and oil prices at the global market, he tweeted.
He said it was worth mentioning that PMâ€™s Rs5 per unit concessional package has been implemented.
